info.title: HybridNetworkManagementClient
info.description: The resources in this swagger specification will be used to manage the network function publisher in a Hybrid Network resource provider.

get.description: Lists all the available network function definition and network service design publishers.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of available publishers.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a publisher overview.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Get information about configuration group schema overview.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Payload for execute request post call.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting configuration group schema overview.

202.description: Accepted. The header contains 'Location' header which can be used to monitor the progress of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all available network function definition group under a publisher.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of network function publisher networkFunctionDefinitions.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get information about network function definition overview.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting network function publisher network function definition group overview.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists available network function versions under a network function definition group.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting available network function publisher network function definition versions of a network function definition group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get information about network function definition version overview.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting network function publisher network function definition version overview.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all available network service design group under a publisher.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of network service design groups.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get information about network service design overview.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting publisher network service design group overview.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists available network service design versions under a network service design group.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting available network service design versions of a network service design group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get information about network service design version overview.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting network service publisher network service design version overview.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all available configuration group schema under a publisher.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of configuration group schema.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get information about configuration group schema overview.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting publisher configuration group schema overview.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Get information about network function definition version overview.

202.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting network function publisher network function definition version overview.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Get information about images in a helm chart in network function definition version overview.

202.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting network function publisher network function definition version overview.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
